Constructor Detail

JmDNSPeer

public JmDNSPeer(JmDNSPeerFinder finder,
                 String port,
                 String path,
                 MessageSender msgSender,
                 SwirlGUIConfig conf)
Generic constructor to make a new peer outside of the peerFinder

Parameters:
finder - listens to jmdns messages for peer
port - the port the server is running on
path - the path to slide on the server
msgSender - lets the peer broadcast messages to listeners

JmDNSPeer

public JmDNSPeer(JmDNSPeerFinder finder,
                 javax.jmdns.ServiceInfo serviceInfo)
          throws URIException
Used by peerFinder to create new peer from network message

Parameters:
finder - the peerFinder that created the peer
serviceInfo - the info to build the peer
Throws:
URIException - if there's a problem figuring out the port or path
